item.title: IntelliJ
item.description: Learn IntelliJ There is now a guided way to learn this complex tool - this video introduces it: Learn IntelliJ IDEA (2021) - YouTube Code Formatting As soon as you share code using Source Code Management (e.g. Git), you should take care that everyone in the team uses the same code formatting - otherwise changes in formatting will make it hard to track and understand the real changes.
